response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item carries a significant value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. I am offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $750,000. I believe its unique features and unparalleled quality justify this investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this extraordinary offer.", "product_price": 750000}
